column3: 2 add-Measure 1/16 teaspoon of baking soda and add it to the mug
3 add-Measure 4 tablespoons of flour and add it to the mug
4 add-Measure 1/8 teaspoon of salt and add it to the mug
6 Stir-Stir the contents in the mug well
7 Add-Add in 3 tablespoons of milk to the mug
8 Add-1 tablespoon of olive oil to the mug
9 Mix-Mix the contents of the mug thoroughly. (There might be some lumps, but that is ok.
11 spread-spread marinara sauce around the surface of the batter
12 Sprinkle-Sprinkle 1 generous tablespoon of mozzarella cheese on top of the sauce
13 Sprinkle-Sprinkle dried Italian herbs inside the mug
14 Microwave-Microwave for 1 minute 20 seconds, or until it rises and the toppings are bubbling
5 add-Measure 1/8 teaspoon of baking powder and add it to the mug
